text: to kya, jo nirjeev raha ho, phir hamane use jeevan pradaan kiya ho tatha usake lie prakaash bana diya ho, jisake ujaale mein vah logon ke beech chal raha ho, us jaisa ho sakata hai, jo andheron mein ho, usase nikal na raha ho[1]? isee prakaar, kaafiron ke lie unake kukarm sundar bana diye gaye hain
